name: Monster Jaunt
description: Monster Jaunt is a 4-player minigame party for people who want real variety and care about winning. Compete in a diverse assortment of minigames between rounds of a simple-but-deep strategic board game.Diverse MinigamesFrom high-speed penguin races to competitive inventory management to cerebral memory challenges, fourteen challenging and varied minigames await. Whether you want a fresh take on a classic minigame or a brand new concept you've never played before, there's a minigame for you!Lightweight Strategy Board GameMonsters have arrived from another dimension to...have a great vacation? Between minigames, draft monsters and plan vacation routes in a Euro-inspired board game. No more rolling dice and hoping for a win!Throwback Aesthetic'90s kids, rejoice! Monster Jaunt takes visual inspiration from 3D greats of the mid- to late-'90s -- Bright colors, geometrics textures, few polygons, hidden cheats, and cheery MIDI tunes.Friendly OptionsPlay with 1-4 players and fill in with bots. Disable minigames you don't like or increase the odds of your favorites appearing. Don't button mash if you don't want to. Remap controls however you need.
